hey guys...my back really hurts like WOW. today i rode both of my baby's, for you dumb asses my horses. and then got my hair cut and also had an ortho appiontment and now my teeth hurt and it sucks. life...i dont got much to say, being drug free is way over rated and it sucks....a lot!! it kinda sucks not being able to trust a guy anymore, i just cant let myself go through that kinda pain again...till later... urlLink

hey i just got back from summer school...haha it was funny today all the gay freshman guys were bein gloud and imature so i yellecd at them and they are all like wow she's a bitch! and it just made me laugh. and now i have a chiropractor(i don't know how to spell it) appointment @ 11:45 and maybe i'm gunna ride after still not sure...i just realized i like post about what im doing not how im feeling...but the truth i really dont feel much. this meds. they got me fucked up on i like don't feel much emotion anymore. i guess i like it because im not depressed but at the same time it kinda sucks...really hard to explain but atleast its better than before...im for sure not complaining i mean im happy as a clam...hahaha clam. i just have way to much extra time to think about things, which in a way is good but i dunno. sorry im a freak i know but i like it that way lol. wow well anyways...till later Posted by urlLink Hello

i woke up it wuz 7 i waited till 11 just to figure out that one would call i think i got alot of friends but i dont hear from them whats another night all alone when yer spending everyday on your own and here it goes im just a kid and life is a nightmare im just a kid i know that its not fair nobody cares cuz im alone and the world is havin more fun then me tonight and mayde wen the night is dead i'll crawl into my bed im staring at these four walls again i'll try to think about the last time i had a good time everyonez got somewhere to go and theyre gonna leave me here on my own what the hell is wrong with me dont fit in with anybody how did thid happen to me wide awake im board and i cant fall asleep and every night iz the worst night ever im just a kid and all life is a nightmare im just a kid i know that its not fair cuz im alone and the world is nobody wants to be alone in the world im just a kid and all life iz a nightmare im just a kid i know that its not fair nobody cares cuz im alone and the wurld is nobody wants to be alone n the world nobody cares cuz im alone and the world is havin morwe fun then me tonight im all alone tonight nobody cares tonight im just a kid tonight! Posted by urlLink Hello
its morning!!! yes another day i wake up and go to summer school!!! i just cant wait...the anxiety is killing!!!! god i better go get ready!!!!! for now Posted by urlLink Hello

What's the difference of never knowing at all? When every step I take is always too small. Maybe it's just something I can't admit but lately, I feel like I don't give a shit. Motivation such an aggravation, Accusations don't know how to take them. Inspiration's getting hard to fake it. Concentration's never hard to brake it. Situation never what you want it to be. What's the point of never making mistakes? Self-indulgence is such a hard habit to brake. It's all just a waste of time in the end. I don't care so why should I even pretend. Motivation such an aggravation, Accusations don't know how to take them. Inspiration's getting hard to fake it. Concentration's never hard to brake it. Situation never what you want it. Nothing's new, everything's the same. It keeps on dragging me down, it's getting kind of lame. I'm falling further behind, there's nothing to explain. No matter what you say nothing 's gonna change my mind. Can't pretend on doubt until the end. It seems like leaving friends has become This years trend and though I can't pretend. It's not the same but who's to blame, For all those stupid things I never said. Motivation such an aggravation, Accusations don't know how to take them. Inspiration's getting hard to fake it. Concentration's never hard to brake it. Situation never what you want it to be. Motivation such an aggravation, Accusations don't know how to take them. Inspiration's getting hard to fake it. Concentration's never hard to brake it. Situation never what you want it to be. Never what you want it to be. Never what you want it to be. TOTALY HOW I FEEL!!! urlLink Posted by urlLink Hello

i just finshed eating dinner which was so good b/c i hadnt eaten anything all day!! i have been way to busy...i went home rigth after school and then had to start to pack everything for my horse show tommorw and then i had tutor at 1:45 and then rigth after if inshed tutor i had to go ride my horse and get all of that stuff together then help my dad get the boat and then i came home and took a shower then ate and now im here really injoying sitting b/c i havent done much of it today!!! and i really should be packing and doing lundry and shit but i really just dont have the energy. i want to go to sleep but there is still way to much that has to be done!!! im really pumped for the show but at the same time im kinda sad because im not gunna be around for the first weekend of summer!! ill get over it...i kinda am intrested in this guy but he thinks that he could be a really good friend of mine and doesnt wanna ruin that...shit why is it that all guys just want to be a friend? who knows maybe its just an excuse because they dont wanna hurt my feelings..anyways im gunna get back on that packing...for now Posted by urlLink Hello

that how i feel about finals!!!! i have been stuck in my house for it feels like forever!!! studying for these stupid things!!! so finals fuck you!!! but anyways jesse told me to post so i am this weekend was actually pretty good..friday night some peeps came over and then all of the sudden this group of people were outside my house...and i had no idea where they came from but then we went to bj's and had a pazookie so good!!!! saturday i went to aaron's and hun gout wiht people and ricky was there and i love that kid!!!!!! made my night....then today fucking finals and my mom is an ass and is being mean to me :'( she is a fag so it doesnt matter...for now urlLink Posted by urlLink Hello

hey guys i havent posted in it feels kike forever...just havent had the time. so friday night was fun i guess i went with my brother and kevin to see the day after tommorw, it was pretty lame but w/e. after we were all really hungry so we went to taco bell. then nothing else really happend that was to intresting. saturday morning i went to arrowhead with kurt and the blassmans. just pretty much chilled and then woke up on sunday at 7 and went wakeboarding which was awesome!!! but i am so sore i might die. then went home that afternoon and went to the obrien's BBQ thing which was okay..after that i went to nick L's house and hung out with aaron, matt, nick this girl i dunno who she was and then ryan came...and he was wearing a skirt...not really sure why but okay..lol my brother came to pick me up and matt slammed my brother's door to his truck and he flipped out it was pretty funny. monday went to cohen's house for another BBQ and aaron came with then watched the laker game...today sucked i wasnt in a very good mood for some reason. i just had tutor and im better now but i am STARVING!!!...till later urlLink

FROZEN QUEEN/ KING You dont want love to come through to you. You like it the way you are. To be unreachable, no need to show feelings. Hiding everything inside you. You are already used to it. You say yourself that you dont need anyone, that you stand on your own two feet or that you dont have time for these things. But in reality you are scared to get hurt. You feel save where you are: by yourself, nobody can hurt you there. You invent your own relationship in your dreams. You just need to know that you COULD get a partner. Thats it. PLEASE VOTE, I want to know what you think about my quiz, I worked hard on it.You can always message me or tell me how I can improve that quiz. Ill sure write back. urlLink ~THE big LOVE TEST!! hey!!!! i just got back from mammoth it was so awesome. i got to use my new wakeboard which is so sick i love it so much! the lake was so full of alge it was gross but the water was real calm and the last day we went to lake grant and it was so clear and no one was there!!! there was like 3 other boats and some jetskis and then us!! i am so sore though i just want a massage uhh that would be so awesome right now!!!! and the band on the 4th was so awful it was so fucking funny i couldnt even take it!!! im really happy to be home though but then i leave again on friday for a horse show in huntington beach!!! which will be fun i hope. amd then i leave for mammoth again!!! yes!!! for now...
